languages.text: "Ты прав. Металл долга в сердце, металл оружия в руках — ваши дары завершают облик правосудия".
"You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав. Металл долга в сердце, металл оружия в руках — ваши дары завершают облик правосудия".

traits.locale_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."
"You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."
"You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."
"You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."
"You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

languages.text: 「その通りだ。胸に宿る義務の金属、手に握る武器の金属――お前からの贈り物が、正義の姿を完成させる」
languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ。胸に宿る義務の金属、手に握る武器の金属――お前からの贈り物が、正義の姿を完成させる」

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Das Metall der Pflicht in meinem Herzen, das Metall der Waffen in meinen Händen ... eure Geschenke vervollständigen das Gesicht der Gerechtigkeit."
languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Das Metall der Pflicht in meinem Herzen, das Metall der Waffen in meinen Händen ... eure Geschenke vervollständigen das Gesicht der Gerechtigkeit."

languages.text: « Je suis bien d'accord. Mon dévouement d'acier à mon devoir, associé au métal des armes dans mes mains... Vos dons complètent le visage de la justice. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis bien d'accord. Mon dévouement d'acier à mon devoir, associé au métal des armes dans mes mains... Vos dons complètent le visage de la justice. »

languages.text: «Tiene razón. El metal del deber en mi corazón y el metal de las armas que empuño: sus dones completan la faz de la justicia».
languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. El metal del deber en mi corazón y el metal de las armas que empuño: sus dones completan la faz de la justicia».

languages.text: “确实如此。无论是我手中的武器，还是胸膛里的钢铁心脏，都源自你们的礼物，是你们让正义变得更加强而有力。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。无论是我手中的武器，还是胸膛里的钢铁心脏，都源自你们的礼物，是你们让正义变得更加强而有力。”

languages.text: "Haklısın. Gönlümde görevime adanmış, elimde silaha dönüşen metal... Bu armağanlar, adaletin ayrılmaz bir parçası."
languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Gönlümde görevime adanmış, elimde silaha dönüşen metal... Bu armağanlar, adaletin ayrılmaz bir parçası."

languages.original_text: "You are right. The metal of duty in my heart, the metal of weapons in my hands — your gifts complete the face of justice."
